item.title: Trump envoy Witkoff to head to Russia for 'last chance' Ukraine ceasefire talks
item.description: President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff is expected to travel to Russia later this week, the president told reporters on Sunday.

item.title: ABC starts broadcasting with new affiliate in Miami
item.description: ABC programming will air on channel 7 in the Miami-Fort Lauderdale market.

item.title: Texas Republicans say 'hunt down' Democrats who are leaving state over redistricting
item.description: Texas state House Democrats plan to leave to break quorum of a special session in which Republicans aim to pass a new congressional map that could net...

item.title: WATCH: Rescued sea turtle returned to ocean after treatment
item.description: Pennywise, a large sea turtle that was found injured along the Florida coast in May following a boat strike, has been returned to the ocean.

item.title: WATCH: Groom surprises bride and her parents with ASL vows on wedding day
item.description: Zach spent months secretly learning sign language so he could sign his vows to Hallie on their wedding day and make sure her parents were included on ...
